scripts.build: npm run build:typescript && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:dist: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp -r fonts dist/ && cp *.png dist/
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run build && cd dist && python3 -m http.server 3000
scripts.dev:full: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.firebase:deploy:hosting: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
